generated_content.title: Paranormal Mysteries in Salem, Massachusetts - Tours & Services
generated_content.description: Explore the dark history of Salem, where the infamous Salem Witch Trials took place in 1692. Visit haunted sites like the Salem Witch Museum and the House of the Seven Gables, said to be haunted by the spirits of former residents.
